seo: php-fpm,远程代码执行漏洞,PHP-CGI,漏洞检测
summary: 该插件用于检测基于PHP-CGI设置的服务器是否存在远程代码执行漏洞，通过构造特定请求来验证漏洞是否存在。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect whether servers with PHP-CGI settings have remote code execution vulnerabilities by constructing specific requests to verify the existence of the vulnerability.
